name: The House on Cherry Hill
description:
Ayaka’s sister has gone missing inside the infamous haunted mansion on Cherry Hill. She aims to find her and get them both out alive, perhaps also uncovering the mystery of the hidden lab within.

This is a demo/prototype. Feedback is welcome if you have a second. <3

Credits:

Written and illustrated (CG, sprites) by AnjachArts
Edited and programmed by Vex Phoenix 
Photo edits by Vaywen 

Background photos from Freepik, Unsplash (Claudio Schwarz, Eleanor Brooke, Johannes Plenio). 
Sound effects and tracks from YouTube's free to use Audio Library (no attribution required).

Made using Procreate, Photoshop, Pixlr and Ren'py <3
